text: Martha Ellen Scott (September 22, 1912 â€“ May 28, 2003) was an American movie and television actress. She played Janie Prescott in Hi Diddle Diddle. She also played Catherine in the movie In Old Oklahoma. Scott was born in Jamesport, Missouri. She died at the age of 90. == References == == Other websites == * Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Missouri Category:1912 births Category:2003 deaths
